long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Displays a Toolbar at the bottom of the screen which allows the developer to quickly switch between local and non local modes in the SSP's.

Forget about hacking your way across the site to figure out the local URL on SCA, this extension will help you do that with just a click ✨.

Also provides small notifications when it detects a local extension server running.
